input_args.instruction: 'Context: Disease collagenous colitis associates Gene HLA-DQA1. Disease cervix carcinoma associates Gene HLA-DQA1. \n\nQuestion: Out of the given list, which Gene is associated with collagenous colitis and cervix carcinoma. Given list is:  NEURL1, TERT, HLA-DQA1,  TERT,  SLC17A4'
